custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(nss_taskcategory_taskstatus.*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM nss_taskcategory_taskstatus WHERE true AND companyId = ? AND groupId = ? AND active_ = ? AND ( (LOWER(name) LIKE ?
